name: Zombie Madness (deskita)
description:
Zombies have overrun the world! Take your weapons and shoot them down, purchasing upgrades and new weapons along the way.

Gameplay

Shoot the zombies down.

Use the money to upgrade your equipment to make later days easier.

Features

In-built tutorial

High-Scores Board.

Controls

Arrow keys to move.

Use the mouse to shoot.

Supported platforms:

Windows 7, 10.

Updates

* 9/1/2020 - Added sound effect for collecting coins, added tint when game is paused in combat, fixed a bug which prevented tutorial zombies from dying and other changes.
